Mullayanagiri – Baba Budangiri Circuit.description: Highest peaks, stunning viewpoints, caves, and spiritual spots around the Chikkamagaluru–Datta Peeta range.

places.Mullayanagiri Peak: Highest peak of Karnataka, offering sunrise views and a short scenic climb.
places.Seethalayyanagiri: Beautiful hill viewpoint with serene stops on the way to Mullayanagiri.
places.Baba Budangiri (Datta Peeta): Historic mountain shrine known for caves, viewpoints, and cool climate.
places.Manikyadhara Falls: Seasonal hilltop waterfall famous for its spiritual significance and misty surroundings.
places.Jhari Falls (Buttermilk Falls): Private estate waterfall known for its foamy white flow and jeep ride adventure.
places.Honnammanahalla Viewpoint: A peaceful roadside viewpoint offering wide valley panoramas.
places.Kavikal Gandi Viewpoint: Windy open-view cliff point popular for photography.
places.Shakti Hill / Hills near Attigundi: Quiet alternative viewpoints near Chikkamagaluru–Bababudangiri route.
places.Mullodi Hills: Remote hilly region used as the starting point for Kudremukh trek.

Kemmangundi – Z Point Circuit.description: A lush green hill station circuit known for waterfalls, gardens, and breathtaking sunset points.

places.Kemmangundi Hill Station: Classic misty hill station known for gardens, valley views, and cool weather.
places.Z Point Viewpoint: Famous for sunrise and sunset hikes with dramatic ridge views.
places.Hebbe Falls: Iconic multi-tier waterfall accessed via jeep trail through dense forest.
places.Shanti Falls: Small peaceful waterfall located along the Kemmangundi trekking trail.
places.Kalhatti Falls: Waterfall flowing over a temple, known for its unique setting.
places.Rock Garden (Kemmangundi): Man-made garden with stone pathways and valley viewpoints.

Kudremukh – Kalasa – Horanadu Circuit.description: Greenest belt of Chikkamagaluru with grassland treks, forests, and major temples.

places.Kudremukh National Park: UNESCO-recognized mountain range famous for lush grassland landscapes.
places.Kudremukh Peak Trek: One of India’s most scenic treks passing through rolling green hills.
places.Hanuman Gundi Falls: Well-maintained stepped waterfall inside Kudremukh forest area.
places.Gangamoola Trek: Origin point of three major rivers, surrounded by dense forest.
places.Kalasa Temple (Kalaseshwara): Ancient river-side temple known for architecture and natural setting.
places.Horanadu Annapoorneshwari Temple: Famous pilgrimage temple known for hospitality and prasadam.

Aldur – Mudigere – Devaramane Circuit.description: Offbeat mountain trails, coffee estates, rugged jeep routes, and lesser-known peaks.

places.Ettina Bhuja Trek: Popular ridge-style trek offering stunning 360° valley views.
places.Devaramane Grasslands: Offbeat mountain meadows ideal for peaceful sunrise and sunset.
places.Ballarayanadurga Fort Trek: Moderate trek to a ruined fort with panoramic rolling-hill views.
places.Hettur Hills: Quiet hills surrounded by estates and forest patches.
places.Bandekallu Falls: Lesser-known waterfall hidden inside deep forest.

Belur – Halebidu – Heritage Circuit.description: World-famous Hoysala temple architecture, sculpture work, and ancient history.

places.Belur Chennakeshava Temple: Masterpiece of Hoysala architecture known for detailed stone carvings.
places.Halebidu Hoysaleswara Temple: Twin Shiva temple famous for its epic wall sculptures.
places.Belavadi Veeranarayana Temple: Beautiful 13th-century Hoysala temple with ornate pillars.
places.Marle Chennakeshava Temple: Ancient lesser-known temple showcasing early Hoysala style.
places.Hiremagalur Kodandarama Temple: Temple after which Chikkamagaluru’s name originates.

Coffee Museum – Lakes – Chikkamagaluru T.description: Relaxed in-town attractions including lakes, coffee culture, and peaceful viewpoints.

places.Coffee Museum: Official Coffee Board museum showcasing the history and science of coffee.
places.Hirekolale Lake: Stunning reflective lake ideal for photography during sunset.
places.Ayyanakere Lake: Ancient lake surrounded by small hills and greenery.
places.Siri Coffee Statue Park: Artistic themed park depicting local folk culture.
places.Bhadra Dam & Backwaters: Scenic reservoir famous for boating and birdwatching.

Wildlife & Forest Reserves Circuit.description: Tiger reserve, deep forest treks, and nature trails.

places.Bhadra Wildlife Sanctuary: Protected forest home to tigers, elephants, and rich biodiversity.
places.Muthodi Forest Reserve: Peaceful forest zone offering jeep safaris and birdwatching.
places.Bhadra Tiger Reserve Safari (Lakkavalli: Official tiger safari route known for wildlife sightings.
places.Kallathigiri Falls Trek: Forest waterfall trek combining nature and adventure.
